auth.slogan: The Unified Hub for MCP Servers
auth.subtitle: Centralized management platform for Model Context Protocol servers. Organize, monitor, and scale multiple MCP servers with flexible routing strategies.

auth.loginFailed: Login failed, please check your username and password

auth.passwordStrengthError: Password does not meet security requirements
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordRequireLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
auth.passwordRequireNumber: Password must contain at least one number
auth.passwordRequireSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
auth.passwordStrengthHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain letters, numbers, and special characters

settings.enableGlobalRouteDescription: Allow connections to /sse endpoint without specifying a group ID
settings.enableGroupNameRouteDescription: Allow connections to /sse endpoint using group names instead of just group IDs
settings.enableBearerAuthDescription: Require bearer token authentication for MCP requests
settings.bearerAuthKeyDescription: The authentication key that will be required in the Bearer token
settings.skipAuthDescription: Bypass login requirement for frontend and API access (DEFAULT OFF for security)
settings.pythonIndexUrlDescription: Set UV_DEFAULT_INDEX environment variable for Python package installation
settings.npmRegistryDescription: Set npm_config_registry environment variable for NPM package installation
settings.enableSmartRoutingDescription: Enable smart routing feature to search the most suitable tool based on input (using $smart group name)
settings.smartRoutingRequiredFields: Database URL and OpenAI API Key are required to enable smart routing
settings.smartRoutingValidationError: Please fill in the required fields before enabling Smart Routing: {{fields}}
settings.mcpRouterApiKeyDescription: API key for accessing MCPRouter cloud market services
settings.mcpRouterRefererDescription: Referer header for MCPRouter API requests
settings.mcpRouterTitleDescription: Title header for MCPRouter API requests
settings.nameSeparatorDescription: Character used to separate server name and tool/prompt name (default: -)
settings.restartRequired: Configuration saved. It is recommended to restart the application to ensure all services load the new settings correctly.
settings.mcpSettingsJsonDescription: View, copy, or download your current mcp_settings.json configuration for backup or migration to other tools

oauthCallback.serverNotFoundMessage: Could not find server associated with this authorization request.
oauthCallback.sessionExpiredMessage: The authorization session may have expired. Please try authorizing again.

oauthCallback.autoCloseMessage: This window will close automatically in 3 seconds...
oauthCallback.connectionErrorMessage: Authorization was successful, but failed to connect to the server.
oauthCallback.reconnectMessage: Please try reconnecting from the dashboard.
oauthCallback.configurationErrorMessage: Server transport does not support OAuth finishAuth(). Please ensure the server is configured with streamable-http transport.
oauthCallback.internalErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred while processing the OAuth callback.

install.step2Cursor: Open Cursor, go to Settings > Features > MCP
install.step3Cursor: Click 'Add New MCP Server' to add a new server
install.step4Cursor: Paste the configuration in the appropriate location and restart Cursor
install.step2ClaudeCode: Open Claude Code, go to Settings > Features > MCP
install.step3ClaudeCode: Click 'Add New MCP Server' to add a new server
install.step4ClaudeCode: Paste the configuration in the appropriate location and restart Claude Code
install.step2ClaudeDesktop: Open Claude Desktop, go to Settings > Developer
install.step3ClaudeDesktop: Click 'Edit Config' to edit the configuration file
install.step4ClaudeDesktop: Paste the configuration in the mcpServers section and restart Claude Desktop
install.installToClaudeCode: Add {{name}} MCP server to Claude Code
install.installToClaudeDesktop: Add {{name}} MCP server to Claude Desktop
